read_vocabulary.title: Read Vocabulary Term
read_vocabulary.description: Read a particular controlled vocabulary term.

reconcile.title: Reconcile Against SNAC
reconcile.description: Reconcile a given constellation against all constellations in SNAC, returning the top results.

user_information.title: Get User Information
user_information.description: Returns the information for the given user, including information for Constellations locked to the user.

insert_constellation.title: Insert New Constellation
insert_constellation.description: Insert a new Constellation into SNAC. The Constellation must have the operation flags set to "insert".

update_constellation.title: Update Constellation
update_constellation.description: Updates SNAC's copy of the given Constellation with this one.  Any components with operation flags set to "update" will be overwritten with the new version.

unlock_constellation.title: Unlock Constellation
unlock_constellation.description: Drops the lock on the given Constellation from "currently editing" down to simply locked to the user.

publish_constellation.title: Publish Constellation
publish_constellation.description: Publishes the given Constellation in SNAC.  This does not make any updates to the Constellation data in SNAC.

review_constellation.title: Send Constellation for Review
review_constellation.description: Sends the given Constellation in SNAC for review.  This does not make any updates to the Constellation data in SNAC.

delete_constellation.title: Delete Constellation
delete_constellation.description: Deletes the given Constellation from SNAC.  This does not make any updates to the Constellation data in SNAC before deleting.

reassign_constellation.title: Reassign Constellation to Another User
reassign_constellation.description: Reassigns the given Constellation to a different user, i.e. changes which user to which the Constellation is locked.  This does not make any updates to the Constellation data in SNAC.

recently_published.title: List Recently Published
recently_published.description: Returns a list of the most recently published Constellations in SNAC.

random_constellations.title: List Random Constellations
random_constellations.description: Returns a random subset of the Constellations in SNAC.

list_constellations.title: List Constellations
list_constellations.description: Returns a list of Constellations based on the query parameters.

constellation_history.title: Get Constellation History
constellation_history.description: Returns the edit history of the given Constellation.

download_constellation.title: Download Constellation
download_constellation.description: Returns the full Constellation in the requested format.

constellation_list_maybesame.title: List Maybe-Same Constellations
constellation_list_maybesame.description: Returns a list of Constellations denoted as maybe-same-as the given Constellation.

constellation_add_maybesame.title: Add Maybe-Same Constellation Assertions
constellation_add_maybesame.description: Makes a maybe-same assertion between the constellations specified.

constellation_diff.title: Compute Constellation Diff
constellation_diff.description: Computes the difference between the two given Constellations.  Returns Constellation objects containing: only those items in the first, only those items in the second, and components shared.

parameters.constellationid1: Constellation ID for one Constellation to compare

parameters.constellationid2: Constellation ID for the other Constellation to compare

returns.constellation1: Constellation object containing only data distinct to the first Constellation

returns.constellation2: Constellation object containing only data distinct to the second Constellation

returns.intersection: Constellation object containing only data shared by both Constellations

returns.mergeable: Boolean value denoting whether these two Constellations can be merged by this user

constellation_diff_merge.title: Compute Constellation Diff and Set Merge
constellation_diff_merge.description: Computes the difference between the two given Constellations.  Checks out the two Constellations in editing for the given user to allow a merge.  Returns Constellation objects containing: only those items in the first, only those items in the second, and components shared.

parameters.constellationid1: Constellation ID for one Constellation to compare

parameters.constellationid2: Constellation ID for the other Constellation to compare

returns.constellation1: Constellation object containing only data distinct to the first Constellation

returns.constellation2: Constellation object containing only data distinct to the second Constellation

returns.intersection: Constellation object containing only data shared by both Constellations

returns.mergeable: Boolean value denoting whether these two Constellations can be merged by this user

constellation_merge.title: Merge Constellations
constellation_merge.description: Given Constellation IDs and a full, merged, Constellation, creates a new Constellation in SNAC from the given Constellation and sets all Constellations given by the IDs to be "tombstoned" and redirected to the new, merged, Constellation.

parameters.constellationids: Array of Constellation IDs to tombstone in favor of the merged Constellation

returns.constellation: Full merged Constellation object with IDs

constellation_auto_merge.title: Automatically Merge Constellations
constellation_auto_merge.description: Given Constellation IDs, creates a new Constellation in SNAC from the combined data from all Constellations, "tombstones" the originals, and redirects thier IDs to the new, merged, Constellation.

parameters.constellationids: Array of Constellation IDs to merge

read.title: Read Constellation
read.description: Returns the full Constellation for viewing.

parameters.constellationid: Constellation ID for Constellation to read

parameters.arkid: ARK ID for Constellation to read

parameters.version: Version of the Constellation to read

edit.title: Edit Constellation
edit.description: Check out the Constellation for editing.

parameters.constellation: Constellation object with ID and version to edit

returns.constellation: Full Constellation object checked out for editing

search.title: Search Constellations
search.description: Search for a Constellation, returning a list of possible matches.

browse.title: Browse Constellations
browse.description: Given a query name heading, returns the surrounding matching Constellations (in alphabetical order).

insert_resource.title: Insert Resource
insert_resource.description: Given a Resource, inserts it into SNAC's resource cache.

update_resource.title: Update Resource
update_resource.description: Given a Resource, update the resource cache in SNAC by overwriting it with the given one.

read_resource.title: Read Resource
read_resource.description: Read the entire Resource from SNAC's resource cache.

resource_search.title: Search Resources
resource_search.description: Searches the resource cache in SNAC.  Returns the top matches.
